attributes.action: Reduce Diesel Tax For Commercial Vehicles & Cap Fuel prices like Energy Cap
attributes.additional_details:
At the same time, the price of fuel crisis we are facing (Petrol / Diesel) should be capped like the Electricity & Gas prices are currently for the public to ease the cost of living crisis. 
Large Fuel companies are clearly profiteering from these current prices making billions of £ per year in profits from those just trying to go to work or commuting
The UK Government should Immediately make this law an urgent matter before inflation spirals out of control and in turn, costs everyone even more
attributes.background:
The Tax on Diesel in the UK is far too high for commercial vehicles. This is putting the price up of all goods including food for everyone.
By reducing the Tax, this will help everyone suffering from the current cost of living crisis which is due to both the pandemic and the War in Ukraine.

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, and fuel duty is set at a single rate, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
